titles.title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to clarify the grade and pay of podiatrists of the Department of Veterans Affairs.
To amend title 38, United States Code, to clarify the grade and pay of podiatrists of the Department of Veterans Affairs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary: This bill states that the grade and pay of podiatrists of the Department of Veterans Affairs are on the same schedule as physicians and dentists.
